website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice that provides support as well as extras for pain relief.
pros: Consumers comment on the high quality of this brace, and say that it provides good compression
It also stands out for being easy to put on
We love the option to use heat or cold to help ease discomfort
cons: A few felt this design was heavy
the included ice packs tend not to stay cold for long periods

customer_reviews.title: WHY IS THE "APERTURE" DIRECTLY OVER THE SPOT MY PT SAID TO ICE?!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an RN diagnosed with two near full thickness tears is rotator cuff related tendons, supraspinatus and long head of the bicep. My PT recommended icing the area frequently as we're trying to do PT to avoid invasive surgical repair. PT cupped his hand and put it over my shoulder saying, "THIS is the area you want to ice, not the sides or the back where the pain is radiating to. Ice HERE where the pain is originating. I'm still trying to customize this rig but it seems that, for some reason, there is a HOLE directly OVER the spot that requires ice/cold the most! It helps overall but WHY the aperture. It's missing the mark!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Easy To Use One Handed
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most amazing produc.f. I have found after two rotator cuff surgeries. It can be worn with your sling and is easy to put on alone. I would recommend this product to anyone and bought a second one for a friend who is having surgery but lives alone, much easier to use than the bulky, heavy ice machines.
customer_reviews.author: a.bubenik

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness, maybe it's me. With my right shoulder injured, I couldn't maneuver to adjust the support to my shoulder/arm. The tube connection towards the face is annoying. It needs to be on the opposite side. I followed the instructions carefully. Excellent construction of product. Will place gel pack in freezer for use alone. I live alone; maybe if I had help with it putting it on, it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Magali Rojas

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of ice packs out there, but ...
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of ice packs out there, but because this one has compression the ice pack is held up tightly to the body. I got this after shoulder surgery and use it almost daily after my physical therapy exercises. I wish you could buy a single gel pack separately so that I could start with one hot and end with one frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me, but still a good product...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this after shoulder surgery but it did not work out. The ice pack it very rigid but does fit well in the pocket and the velcro holds it well. It did not work for me but the return was extraordinarily easy and fast. Great customer service made this a great experience anyway.
customer_reviews.author: M Andre

customer_reviews.title: Huge relief for my rotator cuff pain!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, highly adjustable. Squeeze bulb air pump works great at pressing the gel pack against the shoulder. Once you get it adjusted the first time, it's easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G Acciardi

customer_reviews.title: Great relief!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after a recommendation from my Dr to help with recovery from a recent A/C joint surgery. WOW, what a relief! I use this product multiple times daily and even wear it to sleep in. I'm 6'5'', 250lbs and large framed, so the sizing is on point. My only suggestions would be a bit more fitment in the top of the trapezius area and for the ice pack to last a bit longer but overall its a great product. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Welch

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I've been having shoulder pain that is much worse at night. I had been taking ibuprofen before bed and again when I woke up 6 hours later in pain as it wore off. I bought this thing to ice my shoulder down, and it works and felt great. I didn't think I'd be able to sleep in it, but I gave it a shot and slept through the night without any medicine. Very little pain (as opposed to a lot). When I wake up I'm a little stiff and by upper back hurts a little, but it's SO much better than it was. I was not expecting this product to work nearly this well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H. Imler

customer_reviews.title: NOT for LEFT shoulder injury!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a right shoulder injury, keep looking. My left shoulder was injured. A the "controls" were on my back. It couldn't get into or out of it w/o help. I couldnt lay down with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Dias

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago, my husband had his rotator cuff torn in a car accident. They performed surgery to correct it. His arm is functional, but frequently becomes inflamed or injured and we were always working on ways of wrapping ice packs around his shoulder using ace bandages. I saw this and though it would work well. It does, he can put it on by himself, and it provides the cold relieve everywhere he needs it without having to manhandle around 2-3 ice packs that never get on the right spot. This encompasses the entire shoulder and works perfectly. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: perfect for shoulder icing
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for icing the shoulder. You will not be disappointed. Place the ice pack in the freezer and when you are ready, just place it within the sling's velcro. Use the pump to allow it to mold to the contour of your shoulder. You can disconnect the pump and use the release valve when you are done. I set it up once and simply slip my arm in it when I need it. That way I don't have to restrap everything from scratch. Only need to strap across the chest and I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pressure Cold Pack for shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn rotator cuff. This product is exactly what I need. I am petite and was worried that it would be too big. It is easy to adjust to fit my shoulder. I LOVE the pump up pressure sleeve. It holds the cold pack in place. The pressure it provides also feels good on my shoulder. I have used it without the cold pack just for the support it gives my shoulder. It is comfortable. The strap is not uncomfortable across my breast or back. I place a thin cup towel between the cold pack and my shoulder. The pack stays cold for about an hour and remains cool for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship; air-compression is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this shoulder support is everything I had hoped for. Good materials and workmanship. The air compression was something I didn't care much about until I used the support. Filling with air provides an adjustable level of compression that you can't get on other supports. The only downside with this support is that it's bigger than others. Not something I can easily wear to work, but that's OK. I use it in the evenings before bed. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Goodman

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I recently had surgery on my shoulder, and after discontinuing the use of the ice machine, this was a good replacement. It is kind of bulky, but once you get it fitted correctly it works well. My only two complaints are that it tends to sit lower on the shoulder, so you mostly feel the cold on the arm and I had to use a tea towel underneath to keep my arm from freezing. The second is that, the cold packs that fit inside don't stay cold very long. I did buy an extra one, and that did help.
customer_reviews.author: S.D. Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: I rated it average for comfort because I was in major pain when I needed to use it. I gave 2 stars for ease of use because it's very complicated to figure out the first few times, and I needed assistance to get it on my body each time. The ice packs are powerful though, and given the rounded shape of the ice packs those were most efficient to use without the whole get up. I still use the ice packs for shoulder, knees and ankles. They fit nicely. I gave 5 stars for value for the money. Definitely a good investment at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous shoulder icing systems over 30 years.... This, so far the first week I've had it, is the best. Not just because of the quality and price, but also because it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Buy It! Don't Hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product on Amazon! If you have shoulder pain do not hesitate to buy this. I saw it and thought about it for a couple days. I wish I bought it sooner. Does it get rid of all the pain no. But it is helping. All injuries are different. My i is related to an improper injection. The directions are great with pictures. I get it on My shoulder and lay down and adjust it. The air compression helps too. .
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery in November to repair a torn labrum. Instead of the ice machine specific for my shoulder, I opted to purchase this product. I've had the ice machines before for other surgeries, and wanted mobility during my recovery time, that ice machines don't allow for. The product is well constructed, easy to put on alone and one handed, fits under and along side my sling, and stays hot and cold for an appropriate amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: TX-Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Heat/Ice/Compression All In One
customer_reviews.text: Like the option of cold or heat. Like the compression bulb and hose. Took awhile to analyze how to place it on. Took my wife awhile to properly get all straps in place. Don't see how I'm going to put it on when she's not at home. Overall perfect and great price point for rotator cuff surgery. But when you are out on the town you will receive questions because of the bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Agee

customer_reviews.title: Post surgery review
customer_reviews.text: I bought it went first injured my shoulder. Unfortunately, it turned out the injury was a bit more complicated than a simple partial dislocation. (Lots of pain) Requiring surgery much sooner than expected. The fit is really good Adult male 44” chest with larger arms. Other than the thoughtful the pump is what makes it stand out. By conforming to your shoulder maximizing cooling and helps immobilize the arm a little bit. Pro’s Functional design Pump for perfect fit Quality product Price for what your getting Light weight can bring it to work for mid day relief Cons Lower are bands need to be a tad longer ICE pack needs 25% more liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Randy K

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to pain reliever for my shoulder. I would write a long detailed review, but just saying that it gets the job done is enough said. Just make sure that you at least cover your skin with a towel or something of that nature, as this will be quite cold on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dependability

customer_reviews.title: She sent me a message the day after wearing the sleeve for a few hours sharing that she had the best night's sleep since she could remember
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend who had been experiencing shoulder pain for months. She had surgery to remove some scar tissue and was still in pain with practically no relief. She sent me a message the day after wearing the sleeve for a few hours sharing that she had the best night's sleep since she could remember. Her direct quote, "I slept pain free for the first time in months. I'm really wondering why the medical professionals don't provide this... I can now move my arm across my body, move it up and down... that caused me so much pain just yesterday. Thanking God for you today!"
customer_reviews.author: MotherDear16

customer_reviews.title: Must have when recovering from shoulder surgery
customer_reviews.text: This product has been an absolute lifesaver for me after rotator cuff and labral tear surgery on my shoulder. Definitely watch the explainer video about how to use it and if possible have someone with you to help you figure out how to set it up the first time. Once you know how to set it up it’s very easy to put it on yourself. The cooling and compression feel great on my shoulder and have been extremely helpful as I am recovering from the surgery. I haven’t used this for heat therapy yet but I imagine I will and I expect it to work very well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way too uncomfortable & heavy. Makes your back start to hurt. U have keep it right in position for it to work & that is hard cause it is heavy. It's so heavy you can't keep it on long enough to work. I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. You get to apply heat and cold to your shoulder with compression. It's relatively simple to put on by yourself and does not fall off. I've also used this on my knee and although it doesn't naturally fit a leg, the compression really helps this device stay in place. My first unit was defective, the stitching on the strap had let go. I emailed the seller and the u it was quickly replaced. Excellent customer service and will recommend this product to all of my fellow broken friends.
customer_reviews.author: D. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cold pack! Trying to put off shoulder replacement surgery but the pain is really bad, this compression ice pack is a game changer! Fits perfectly and works great
customer_reviews.author: Todd S

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Support
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of hot and cold use. The idea of inflating it for compression was great. I have had both shoulders operated on for Rotator tears. I purchased this for Bursitis this go round. The only draw back I had was trying to put it on alone and had to request help. Will keep trying until I am capable of getting it on alone. I would refer this for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Best icing tool for shoulder patients
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery and had bought multiple types of ice packs. all fell off or were not tight enough to work adequately. My son told me about this icing method and said baseball pitchers use it. True or not, I bought one and it works beautifully. It adjusts to my arm and shoulder and because of the Velcro, stays put. Good for both left or right shoulder/arm.
customer_reviews.author: doncin

customer_reviews.title: Three Shoulder Wraps Tested
customer_reviews.text: Out of the three shoulder wraps tested this one is the best. All were purchased on Amazon in 2019. I found one that plugged into an outlet and provided long term heat, as opposed to a microwavable heat pack. I liked that one a lot but, it did not fit well and the straps were poor quality. Meanwhile this wrap fits well, is very adjustable and fits a shoulder well. Because of the compression it fits into all the crevices of a should. I was able to purchase an electric heating pad that fit well inside of this brace. With the pad and brace together, its the best of all worlds. I recommend this to anyone needing a heated brace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable to Me
customer_reviews.text: This is very uncomfortable and does not fit snug to your body even when inflated. When you inflate it it seems to just push away from your shoulder instead of fit tighter. I had hoped to be able to sleep with it, (not inflated and only with a towel in between the ice pack and my skin), and it is impossible because it is so uncomfortable. I use the ice pack alone more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Genea Garry

customer_reviews.title: what a bad product
customer_reviews.text: I am having a real hard time trying to understand why would someone vote 4 to 5 stars for this product when the pressure bag can't even property wrap around the shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Friday Starks

customer_reviews.title: Maybe works better for cold treatment
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help with my injured rotator... really only using the heat treatment. A bit disappointed in how it “heats up”. I had to microwave much longer than the instructions suggested, even with a powerful microwave. The insert doesn’t heat consistently either. I haven’t tried cold treatment yet. Overall the sling is comfortable and I really like the inflation option to tighten around the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Owens

customer_reviews.title: In pain trying to get some relief.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I have two tendon tears in my right shoulder and trying to relieve some of the pain before I have surgery. So I plan using it after the surgery too. I haven’t scheduled the surgery yet due to my blood glucose A1c needed to be a better number than what it is at.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: super heavy and heat does not last longer
customer_reviews.text: Product is not easy to put in place (you will need help ... cannot do it by yourself). It is heavy .... super heavy and the pads do not hold the heat for longer ... not worth the effort of putting on!
customer_reviews.author: Eglantina Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, doesn’t cover shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Trying to buy a product to heat my whole shoulder girdle. If you want to heat or cool just your deltoid, then I guess ok, other than that this is worthless. Tried for 5 minutes, returned product. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder compression is awesome, it help a lot with shoulder pain specially after Gym. Will recommend this product. The compression is exactly what you need to help cold pads do their job. It will hold your shoulder tight to make the cold/ hot pads reach the affected areas . A must have if your shoulder are bothering you..
customer_reviews.author: The reviewer- 77

customer_reviews.title: Great product however women may find it difficult us.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, it is bulky but functional, the air pump is nice but it cannot be removed without deflating. It is made for men. I could use this because both of my breasts have been removed. Breasts would make it seem impossible to use. I like its ability to keep shoulder snug and secure preventing reinjury. Aside from the breast concern I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for left shoulder injury
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Study with big, thick straps. Puts the ice and pressure exactly where it is needed. Love the custom shaped ice pack. Fits great on both arms, but can only put on by yourself if going on the left arm, as the straps wrap behind the arm. My husband's injury is on his right shoulder, so I'm going to spend months helping him in and out of it. But it immediately gave relief, so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: GoldGirlNW

customer_reviews.title: Size Does Not Fit All
customer_reviews.text: This thing works and is easy to use, however it is not a universal fit. I'm 5'2" and do not have broad shoulders. This is definitely made for a bigger person. If I wear this according to instructions, with the hole at the corner of my shoulder, it comes right up my neck to choke me. I'd like for them to make this for people with smaller shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Serling

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy an ice strap specifically for my shoulder, but I'm so glad I gave in and purchased it. If you have any sort of shoulder injury, I highly recommend it. I loved that I was able to work and do other stuff while the sling kept my shoulder compressed and iced. The air compression is my favorite part about it. I wish it came with an extra ice pack though so I can keep two in the freezer and alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I have frozen shoulder and this has been great to ice the area and add compression on the easiest way I have seen. It's pretty easy to put on by myself and doesn't engage the hurt shoulder. The compression pump works nicely and it lasts for about an hour of cooling. Easy to take off and re-freeze the ice pack. All in all very happy with the set up. If you need to ice your shoulder this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: pigpen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoulder strap to support my injury while I wait for work compensation to get in gear and send me to orthopedic. Since I do not the hanging hose and pump hanguing while at work I took it off. It does feel great to pump air and hold your shoulder tight though. This is a big brace and it does wonders for the injury. Totally support it and recommend if you need to immobilize your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Quality and a bargain - Needs a slight improvement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from my Mom's amazon account so excuse the name. BUT.. I'm a really big guy. I'm about 6'3 285lbs and I look like I could play defensive end in the NFL. I have really big arms and this brace fits and hugs the shoulder when you pump it up. The gel packs need to be filled a little more. They are a LITTLE light so they don't stay ice cold as long as you'd like. I went ahead and ordered a second gel pack so that I can ice for at least an hour straight.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P. White, Ed. D.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoulder wrap I've found
customer_reviews.text: I started getting serious shoulder pain from training on Monkey Bars and doing tons of Pull Ups for Spartan racing. I tried to anchor an ice pack with traditional Ace bandage wraps, but inevitably they would slide or move thus defeating the goal. This compression support is awesome. Getting it on both shoulders requires that you reverse the direction of Velcro straps which can take a time or two to get down, but it's not really a big deal. having the ability added compression insures the cold pack stays right where it's supposed to. This truly kept me training and saved my shoulders as strengthened them. A+++
customer_reviews.author: RichD

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great on this brace however it needs different sizes. It was huge on me hence it couldn’t do what it should. I am petite and this is more for a large man.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Finally some relief for my shoulder!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Hot/Cold & Compression Shoulder Support and have been using it for 2 days. Good quality product. Fits both right and left shoulder and is easy to switch sides. I've been using the ice and have been feeling great relief on my frozen shoulder. This is exactly what I have been looking for. The instructions are quite small print for reading, but it's pretty common sense on how to assemble. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nellarose G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seller, product design lacking
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as pictured and delivery was on time. This in no way reflects on the seller, but I find the product very difficult to position/fasten without help. I am using it to reduce pain/swelling from a torn rotator cuff and have limited mobility in the effected shoulder. I wish the product was easier to use, although it is very effective once in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A BLESSING!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does take a helper when your shoulders are messed up. The amount of pain I experienced trying to place it in the beginning was creating a SUPER negative review. Once I got help to apply it..OMG!!! 5 starts is NOT enough!!! I slept peacefully for the first time in 6 months. I have no insurance and can't get my shoulders fixed. I have high hopes that this will help me until I can see a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: KBruneau

customer_reviews.title: It s worlderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item... i recommend this to those with problems . I’m wondering what a 2 Nd gel pack would cost. It would be nice to have one in the freezer while your heating and using the other. Wonderful.product...I’m very happy. Would be great to hav be one at hand when needed for constant pain. Great product, great customer service Joanna smith Jo Anna smith
customer_reviews.author: Joanna smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product for pitchers who need to ice shoulder!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for pitchers and catchers that need to ice their shoulder post game. My son pitches and this is better than wrapping a ziplock bag of ice to his shoulder all the time.
customer_reviews.author: D73

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to apply cooling to your shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I had better luck after pulling the gel pack out and mushing it around to distribute it evenly. I also installed it at 180° to put more gel above my shoulder. I wish the air bladder would push the gel down more on top of my shoulder. But this is a dream-come-true compared to trying to use ordinary cooling packs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H. SHUDY Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works As Described in Product Listing, BUT Needs Usage Directions
customer_reviews.text: Air compression an outstanding feature - though it's all told rather bulky. You can pretty much believe other posts for symptom relief (mine appears to be a severe rotator cuff strain and this clearly helped) as relates to them. Solid features but may be too big for smaller people. Overall a worthwhile purchase and suspect this won’t be the last time I’ll need it - but have ordered a neoprene immobilizer for under shirt/work. HOWEVER - it needs to include directions (mine did not); it’s not complex but does require some trial and error, and would be nice to have the assurance it’s being applied with its full medical benefit -- the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomasbowie

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling to keep cold pack on shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder tendinitis and bursitis. Works very well with cold pack after a slight learning curve. Whole contraption stays in place very well. No use turning valve on lock just leave it on and hit release button when done. Acupuncturist said forget cold use hot so been putting on a heating pad and use this without insert to hold pad in place. Works great either way.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Yee

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Wrap For Pain
customer_reviews.text: Fits shoulder (I’m 5’1”) so it’s a bit large but not overly so. Will also fit larger persons. Pockets for ice/heat packets are well positioned. Had no problem putting in place on shoulder. Sturdy materials with strong Velcro fastenings. Very pleased to have something that I can firmly attach to my shoulder, to help with pain, and - I can also still move around/do things while wearing it. The ice/heat helps with deep aches/pains. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very Bulky!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so big and bulky, there's nothing discreet about it at all ESPECIALLY when it's inflated. My husband looked like he had a ninja turtle shoulder when we inflated it (he's 5'11" 210 lbs) It also compressed his arm to the point bloodflow was restricted no matter how many times we adjusted it, there was no way we could achieve the amount of pressure he needs for pain relief without cutting off his circulating. Disappointing but I'm sending this baby back. On the plus side its not as difficult to figure out how to put on as some other reviews suggest. A little commonsense can take you a long way. On the positi
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good product..
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. Love the pump to keep the cold pack tightly around the shoulder. The only problem is that it's almost impossible to put this on by yourself. If you don't have someone to help put this on and take it off it will be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great product that just works right
customer_reviews.text: My husband tore his labrum in his shoulder and he bought this to help heal his injury. He loves the system. He says it fits so snugly bc of the air pump and it’s super cold (too much at times when shirtless). Great way to ice but also be mobile around the house.
customer_reviews.author: calla

customer_reviews.title: Product.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry maybe just me but it was hard to get on and very cumbersome not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not so good with a left shoulder
customer_reviews.text: It’s been mentioned a few times - this is practically useless with the left shoulder unless you have help. Partial rotator cuff tear - you’ll never get this thing on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: At first I found it difficult to use. I have been using it for 2 months now after shoulder surgery. It helps warm up the shoulder in the morning, to loosen it up for activities during the day and in the evening to reduce the pain accumulated with use during the day. a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!! Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My husband had rotator cuff surgery and went thru the cryo cuff usage-such a pain. This shoulder compression wrap is a life saver! Perfect for his endless pt he has to do! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Helped a lot in a short amount or time.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely got relief with the brace. Keeps the cold packs tightly in place. A really nice feature is the shape of the ice packs. They are specifically for the sholder area. Got me past a rough patch after doing some things I shouldnt have done with an injured shoulder. I had really over done it, but with this, I got major relief in just two days.
customer_reviews.author: 4evahhis

customer_reviews.title: Great Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: Had rotator cuff repair surgery and now doing therapy. This device is 100% more effective than just laying an ice pack on my shoulder. The compression function makes it even more effective. The therapist also uses ice packs with compression although their's uses an electric pump. I am ordering an extra pack so I can use heat and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Honest E

customer_reviews.title: Good hot/cold pack device- orthopedic relief
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. The function is flawless - fits perfectly over the shoulder and pumping it up presses the hot/cold pack right into the spot in need. I recommend buying a second pack. The only issue is moving the pack around when spots lose their heat/cold but not a big deal. I would recommend to everyone with shoulder pain of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: bhh15

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: My sons are athletes with broad shoulders. Icing over the years after wrestling has been frustrating keeping the ice in place, etc. This solves the problem, fits great & is well used. Son is having shoulder surgery soon & very glad we found this product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the reviews. First off it didn't come with instructions, after messing with it a little we finally figured it out. It didn't really help my husband's shoulder, ended up throwing it away. Only positive on this is it is made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Santana

customer_reviews.title: Needed help to use it
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice if you are using this product for a shoulder injury that’s causing loads of pain it’s best to have someone help you adjust the straps. It’s difficult to do on your own and uncomfortable (for me due to the pain). I’m disappointed that I can’t get a good grip on to secure the straps in a way which is comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Ice and compression are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been lifting weights for 30+ years and have just recently injured my shoulder. Got this based upon the reviews and it really is great. The ice pack conforms to your shoulder with the compression. Not too hard to get on even for a big guy after a few tries. You adjust and leave it that way for subsequent uses. Good quality. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Larg
customer_reviews.text: Too large for someone my size. I’m about 5’10 150lb, and no matter what way I put it on the ice didn’t sit right. Probably great for someone who is not short and has more weight on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who has severe shoulder pain. The first time he used it, it made his shoulders feel better and he absolutely loves it. I also purchased a separate ice pack, so he can switch shoulders, when the first pack thaws.
customer_reviews.author: PMarler

customer_reviews.title: This thing works fantastic. Easy to move from shoulder to shoulder
customer_reviews.text: This thing works fantastic. Easy to move from shoulder to shoulder. Brilliant design. I actually used it on my knee.. It is simply the best reliefke for my inflamation i have ever used. No ice packs..no moving it around its just there. Excellent! And thank you!
customer_reviews.author: c.vaught

customer_reviews.title: It just plain old works.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it would be another waste of money. Not so. I wished I had it when I had surgery on my shoulder years ago. Now that my other shoulder is in bad shape...this is the answer. You can relax and try and hold a cold pack. With the pump you can change the comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen L.

customer_reviews.title: This is it.
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is by far the best device for hot/cold shoulder therapy. I’m on my 5th shoulder surgery with this last one being a replacement and I’ve tried many methods. The key on this one is the pump. It puts the hot or cold tight against the shoulder. It’s amazing so far. On the heat side I had to go 30 seconds in the microwave on each side and then it lasted a good 45 min. I bought the extra pack to keep one in the freezer and one for heating. So far so good. Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Madison

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality. Probably too big for some
customer_reviews.text: Rehabbing sholder after rotator cuff surgery. This product is better quality than the one I was given by PT. The cold pack holds coolness a long time. The directions to make sure you get as good fit are excellent. Good temporary relief, especially after PT. CON: although adjustable it is very big-- big enough to fit a biggo' football player! If you are petite get a kids size.
customer_reviews.author: cyl

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The strip is too short to fit my body. the shoulder cover is very hard to pull to the correct position. The pump air is good idea, but it just make my arm very tight and can't move. I can see a code pad is included, but I can't find a heat pad.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it four stars is because the ice pack only last about 30 minutes. Yes I know you should only ice for 10-20 minutes but I like to ice longer. Works awesome, just had surgery and it has be a life saver. Easy to use and no need to waste all my ice on my freezer. The pump adds good compression to the point that it stabilizes the shoulder making you even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on for my father
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my father's frozen shoulder. It was difficult to strap on and was not comfortable for him. Seems like a well made product, but I'm giving it a 3 star review due to the difficulty in puting this on. Others may have a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: GCV

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky and awkward
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive. Complicated straps, and very uncomfortable. If you really need the compression capability, like post surgery then perhaps it’s worth the trouble. But for ice/hot treatment there are many other cheaper and smaller options.
customer_reviews.author: MemberSince1999

customer_reviews.title: Better than you could imagine for cost and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a fractured shoulder it happened a while ago and never healed properly they want to me to have shoulder replaced but I’m not quite ready so I purchased this shoulder brace with is inflatable and it releaves a lot of pain and i still have range of motion with out the pain I had before
customer_reviews.author: Joann sadler

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoulder Support!
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder support is very well made! It goes on easy and supports the shoulder well. The instructions, that came with the product, are clear and easy to follow. I’m using it for pain relief after shoulder surgery. Very happy with this product👌❗️
customer_reviews.author: Carl Southall

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: It's well, holds your arm and shoulder in place, and does just as described in the information. I brought it to my physical therapist and they were interested in finding out where to order them. They thought it was a great price and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Good product, one thing should change.
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery, labrum and rotator cuff. This item does get parts of your shoulder cold. If you had surgery you will need help putting this on, probably any other item as well for your I shoulder. I like that it reaches my shoulder blade and the front part of my shoulder, is comfortable and well made. The only thing I dislike is the opening that it has, that opening wherever you place it, usually the top part of your shoulder will not get that area cold. I like the pump because you can put pressure against your shoulder at your own comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t fit well if you have large shoulders or arms. I found more relief using my homemade ice packs than using this. Homemade ice packs stay cold way longer. Make your own using rubbing alcohol, water and blue Dawn dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  product
customer_reviews.text: Is a great quality and very supportable for shoulder when you use the pump to keep the shoulder stable and help with pain.easy to put on with flexibility of using a ice pack or heat pack that comes with it well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly pierce

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Damn. This thing is awesome. Wish I knew about it when I was a teen. I blew my arm out pitching at a young age and feel like this could have added years if not saved my arm if I had known. Best healing device I've ever owned for any body part. Will be looking into these devices for any other injure as well.
customer_reviews.author: dalton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Intially it was difficult to understand the application for the needed shoulder to be compressed, but otherwise it’s a great product. Should have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: william heegan

customer_reviews.title: Wearing it now.  Just what the doctor ordered for a torn rotator cuff.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what I would get but it exceeded my expectation in every way. Sturdy, great fit, great compression, all solid pieces that come together to make the perfect shoulder therapy. Tore rotator cuff two weeks ago and this is the first thing I have found that provides relief right where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Smith

customer_reviews.title: This item really keeps everything where it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely good. This shoulder brace keeps everything in place. comfortable to wear and easy to take on and off once you've got it fitted. Helps with pain by enabling a good fit. I had a broken humerus tip and I wish I would have ordered it sooner. Probably would have save myself a bunch of agony. It has an insert for ice or heat. kind of heavy with that in place but works great. provides optimal support for your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: bhein

customer_reviews.title: Good product at very good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product at great price. Tore my org muscle and strained bicep tendon, deltoid and rotator cuff. Like that the compression can operate without the cold/heat pack in it. Only 1 star removed because it can get heavy with the ice/heat pack and that pulled down on my shoulder a bit causing discomfort after a while.
customer_reviews.author: PFA

customer_reviews.title: I only got this product but it is high quality and it is the same brand I use at physical therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the compression eliminate of the ice pack covering. I can get the needed compress without having a heavy load on my rotator cuff. This version has two straps that secure the shoulder/chest area. This makes it difficult to put the ice pack on by myself.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Easy, adjustable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ice pack for the shoulder. I had rotator cuff surgery and it really saved me. Do yourself a favor and get extra inserts that way you always have a cold one on hand. Totally adjustable so it can fit everyone. Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - Comfortable- great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brace. Easy to use, give excellent support and relief after a intense gym workout. My shoulder feels a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Jack White

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cryotherapy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible item. I tore my rotator cuff and am having surgery soon. I’m using this daily. I’d love to get another couple ice packs for this. Thank you for making such a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Exceded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after another horrible shoulder support purchase. Currently dealing with shoulder impingement and possible should tear. This setup is wonderful and well worth the money. Fits great, tight, cold. All you could ask for!
customer_reviews.author: MrAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my shoulder pain that I have had from a rotator cuff injury. I tried a couple different types before this one but having the compression ability as well as the general fit made this one my number one choice.
customer_reviews.author: DSM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This performs well at cold/hot therapy and the inflatable shoulder really helps with fit . Easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: TyeTye

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It serves it's purpose pretty well. I wish it had the directions printed in the box with the product. They're on Amazon, but it would be better if they were printed in color in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: Good product- very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It arrived exactly as it was described and works as described as well. It has helped my shoulders tremendously. It is very simple to use after you read the instructions and is even more easy after you use it a few times. For the price, the product is very high quality I am happily surprised by how nice and good quality the product is!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have multiple tears on rotator cuff and bicep. Need surgery,but delayed due to issues . Great comfort ,wish had another freeze pack or able to purchase. Have tried multiple products, creams and yours along with comfort I am able to stabilize with straps and internal pump. Freeze pack is conforms to shoulder and comfortable to wear. Numbs tissue just enough without discomfort.I love it .This is my 1st post ever on a product, thought you should know with so many product to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super useful after surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Great for post rotator cuff surgery. I have been using this consistently for a whole three months. Highly recommended due to its adjustability and its addition of pressure, not to mention that the insert is removable (in case you want a hot compress or a cold one).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NatraCure Hot/Cold & Compression Shoulder Support 6032 - (Left/Right Reusable Shoulder Brace Wrap with Straps) - Ice Pack, Heating Pad for Sprains, Strains, Injuries and Post Rotator Cuff Surgery
feature_bullets: HELPS ACCELERATE RECOVERY: from injuries while delivering targeted relief from pain for either shoulder.
Includes one support, one compression air pump, and one removable hot/cold gel pack. Washable and reusable. Fits chests up to 50 inches.
NO PRESCRIPTION REQUIRED: Adapts our medical-grade technology for consumer use.

HOT OR COLD THERAPY: Either heat in microwave or chill in freezer or refrigerator. Do not apply gel pack directly to the skin. Use a towel, cloth or sheet as an interface between product and your skin.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
